meanings.sent1: The smell from the garbage can was truly odious.
meanings.sent2: The rotten food in the fridge emitted an odious odor.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the new brand of cat food odious and refused to eat it.
meanings.sent4: The politician's corrupt behavior was as odious as a foul stench.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the decaying carcass was so odious that it made me gag.

meanings.sent1: The criminal's actions were truly odious to the community.
meanings.sent2: The dictator's oppressive regime was considered odious by many.
meanings.sent3: The idea of eating pickles with ice cream was so odious that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The betrayal felt by the friend was as odious as a deep wound.
meanings.sent5: The villain's plan to destroy the city was so odious that it united the citizens against him.
